content: Phase 1: Fix transparent modal background issue across all dialogs
Phase 2: Fix Trading tab - live trading, market data, order placement
Phase 3: Fix Agents tab - agent status, control, and monitoring
Phase 4: Fix Farms tab - farm management and performance tracking
Phase 5: Fix Vault tab - wallet integration and multi-chain support
Phase 6: Fix DeFi tab - lending, borrowing, and yield farming
Phase 7: Fix Advanced tab - all sub-tabs with real data
Phase 8: Connect all components to real backend APIs
Phase 9: Implement WebSocket for real-time updates
